test_cases.test_name: Verify Dashboard Access and Pre-built Templates
test_cases.objective: To verify that users can access pre-built dashboards for deviations, CAPA, batch yield, OEE, and complaints using vendor templates.

test_steps.action: Log in to the pharmaceutical analytics platform using valid credentials.
test_steps.expected_result: User is successfully logged in and the dashboard interface is displayed.

test_steps.action: Navigate to the pre-built dashboards section.
test_steps.expected_result: Pre-built dashboards for deviations, CAPA, batch yield, OEE, and complaints are displayed.

acceptance_criteria: All pre-built dashboards are accessible and display correct data
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data displayed is accurate and consistent

test_cases.test_name: Validate KPI Threshold Configuration and Alert Rules
test_cases.objective: To validate that the system allows configuration of KPI thresholds and alert rules using vendor tools.

test_steps.action: Log in to the pharmaceutical analytics platform using valid credentials.
test_steps.expected_result: User is successfully logged in and the dashboard interface is displayed.

test_steps.action: Access the configuration tools for KPI thresholds and alert rules.
test_steps.expected_result: Configuration interface for KPI thresholds and alert rules is displayed.

test_steps.action: Configure a KPI threshold and an alert rule using the vendor tools.
test_steps.expected_result: KPI threshold and alert rule are successfully configured and saved.

acceptance_criteria: KPI thresholds and alert rules are configurable and saved correctly
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure configurations are accurately saved and applied

test_cases.test_name: Verification of KPI Threshold and Alert Rule Configuration
test_cases.objective: Verify that the system allows configuration of KPI thresholds and alert rules using vendor tools as specified in URS-026-002.
prerequisites: Access to the analytics platform with admin privileges
Predefined KPI thresholds and alert rules

test_steps.action: Log in to the analytics platform with admin credentials.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs in and accesses the admin dashboard.

test_steps.action: Navigate to the KPI threshold configuration section using vendor tools.
test_steps.expected_result: KPI threshold configuration interface is displayed.

test_steps.action: Configure a new KPI threshold and save the settings.
test_steps.expected_result: KPI threshold is successfully saved and appears in the list of configured thresholds.

test_steps.action: Navigate to the alert rule configuration section and create a new alert rule.
test_steps.expected_result: Alert rule is successfully created and appears in the list of configured rules.

acceptance_criteria: KPI thresholds can be configured and saved without errors.
Alert rules can be created and saved without errors.
Configured thresholds and rules are visible in their respective lists.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all configured thresholds and rules are accurately stored and retrievable.
required_expertise: Admin access to the analytics platform
Knowledge of KPI and alert rule configuration

test_cases.objective: Verify that the system enforces row-level security using configured roles as specified in URS-026-005.
prerequisites: Access to the analytics platform with different user roles

test_steps.action: Log in to the analytics platform with a user role that has restricted access.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs in and accesses the dashboard with restricted data visibility.

test_steps.action: Attempt to access data rows that are restricted for the user role.
test_steps.expected_result: User is unable to view or access restricted data rows.

test_steps.action: Log in with a different user role that has access to the restricted data rows.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs in and can view the previously restricted data rows.

acceptance_criteria: Row-level security rules are enforced correctly based on user roles.
Restricted data rows are not accessible to unauthorized users.
Authorized users can access all permitted data rows.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure that data access is strictly controlled based on configured roles.

test_cases.objective: Ensure that the platform enforces row-level security based on configured roles.
prerequisites: Access to test accounts with different roles

test_steps.action: Log in to the platform using a test account with a specific role.
test_steps.expected_result: User should only see data rows accessible by their role.

test_steps.action: Attempt to access data rows outside the user's role.
test_steps.expected_result: Access should be denied or restricted.

acceptance_criteria: Row-level security is enforced correctly based on configured roles.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data access is restricted appropriately.

test_cases.test_name: Validate Dashboard Performance for Large Datasets
test_cases.objective: Verify that dashboards load within the specified time for large datasets.
prerequisites: Access to a dashboard with a 50M-row dataset

test_steps.action: Navigate to a pre-built dashboard with a 50M-row dataset.
test_steps.expected_result: Dashboard should load within 5 seconds.

test_steps.action: Repeat the test under varying system load conditions.
test_steps.expected_result: Dashboard should consistently load within 5 seconds.
data_to_capture: Dashboard load time under varying conditions

acceptance_criteria: Dashboards load within 5 seconds for 50M-row datasets under normal load.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure dashboard data is accurate and complete.

test_cases.objective: To ensure that the platform enforces row-level security based on configured roles, preventing unauthorized access to sensitive data.
prerequisites: Access to test accounts with different roles

test_steps.action: Log in to the platform using a test account with limited access.
test_steps.expected_result: The user should only see data rows permitted by their role.

test_steps.action: Attempt to access restricted data rows.
test_steps.expected_result: Access should be denied, and an appropriate error message should be displayed.

acceptance_criteria: Row-level security is enforced correctly
Unauthorized access attempts are blocked
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity by preventing unauthorized access

test_cases.objective: To verify that dashboards load within the specified time frame for large datasets under normal load conditions.
prerequisites: Access to a dashboard with a 50M-row dataset

test_steps.action: Navigate to a pre-built dashboard with a 50M-row dataset.
test_steps.expected_result: The dashboard should load completely within 5 seconds.

test_steps.action: Repeat the process for multiple dashboards.
test_steps.expected_result: All dashboards should load within the specified time frame.

acceptance_criteria: Dashboards load within 5 seconds
Consistent performance across multiple dashboards
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure accurate and timely data display

test_cases.test_name: Dashboard Performance Validation for Large Datasets
test_cases.objective: Verify that dashboards load within 5 seconds for datasets containing 50 million rows under normal system load.
prerequisites: System is fully installed and configured
Test dataset with 50M rows is available
Normal system load conditions are simulated

test_steps.action: Log in to the system with a user account that has access to the test dashboard.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs in and gains access to the dashboard interface.

test_steps.action: Navigate to the pre-built dashboard configured for the 50M-row dataset.
test_steps.expected_result: Dashboard loads completely within 5 seconds.

acceptance_criteria: Dashboard loads within 5 seconds for the 50M-row dataset.
No system errors or timeouts occur during the test.
data_integrity_requirements: Data must remain consistent and accurate during dashboard loading.

test_cases.objective: Ensure that row-level security is correctly enforced based on configured user roles.
prerequisites: System is fully installed and configured
Test user accounts with different roles are created

test_steps.action: Log in to the system with a user account assigned to Role A.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs in and can access only the data rows permitted for Role A.

test_steps.action: Log in to the system with a user account assigned to Role B.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs in and can access only the data rows permitted for Role B.

acceptance_criteria: Users can only access data rows permitted by their assigned roles.
No unauthorized data access occurs during the test.
data_integrity_requirements: Data access must be strictly controlled based on user roles.

test_cases.test_name: Verification of KPI Threshold Configuration and Alert Rules
test_cases.objective: Verify that the system allows configuration of KPI thresholds and alert rules using vendor tools as specified in URS-026-002.
prerequisites: Access to the analytics platform with admin privileges
Predefined KPI thresholds and alert rules

test_steps.action: Log in to the analytics platform with admin credentials.
test_steps.expected_result: Successful login and access to admin tools.

test_steps.action: Navigate to the KPI threshold configuration section using vendor tools.
test_steps.expected_result: KPI threshold configuration interface is accessible.

test_steps.action: Configure a new KPI threshold and alert rule for a GxP-relevant metric.
test_steps.expected_result: KPI threshold and alert rule are successfully configured and saved.

test_steps.action: Trigger the configured alert by simulating a breach of the KPI threshold.
test_steps.expected_result: Alert is triggered and notification is received as configured.

acceptance_criteria: KPI thresholds and alert rules can be configured using vendor tools.
Configured alerts are triggered upon threshold breach.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all configured thresholds and rules are accurately stored and applied.
required_expertise: Admin access to the analytics platform

test_cases.objective: Validate that the system enforces row-level security using configured roles as specified in URS-026-005.
prerequisites: Access to the analytics platform with multiple user roles

test_steps.action: Log in to the analytics platform with a user role configured for restricted access.
test_steps.expected_result: Successful login and access to restricted dashboards.

test_steps.action: Attempt to access data rows outside the configured security scope.
test_steps.expected_result: Access to restricted data rows is denied.

test_steps.action: Log in with a different user role configured for broader access.
test_steps.expected_result: Successful login and access to additional data rows.

test_steps.action: Verify that the data rows accessible match the configured security rules.
test_steps.expected_result: Only data rows within the security scope are accessible.

acceptance_criteria: Row-level security is enforced based on configured roles.
Users cannot access data rows outside their security scope.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all data access is strictly controlled by role-based security rules.

test_cases.objective: Verify that the platform enforces row-level security as configured in roles for GxP datasets.
prerequisites: Configured roles with row-level security rules
Test user accounts with assigned roles
Sample GxP dataset with restricted rows

test_steps.action: Log in as a test user with restricted row-level access.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully authenticates and accesses the platform.

test_steps.action: Attempt to query a GxP dataset with restricted rows.
test_steps.expected_result: Only rows permitted by the role's security rules are displayed.

test_steps.action: Verify audit trail captures the access attempt.
test_steps.expected_result: Audit log shows user access with timestamp and dataset queried.

acceptance_criteria: Row-level security rules are enforced correctly for all test roles.
No unauthorized data access occurs.
Audit trail captures all access attempts.
data_integrity_requirements: Data access must be restricted per configured roles.
Audit trail must be complete and tamper-evident.
urs_requirements: URS-026-005: The system shall enforce row-level security using configured roles.
URS-026-013: Audit trail shall capture changes to dashboards, alerts, and roles.

test_cases.objective: Validate that governed export to CSV/PDF functions correctly and maintains data integrity.
prerequisites: Configured export permissions for test roles
Sample GxP dataset with known values

test_steps.action: Select a governed dataset and initiate export to CSV.
test_steps.expected_result: Export completes successfully with all expected data.

test_steps.action: Compare exported data to source records for accuracy.
test_steps.expected_result: Exported data matches source records without modification.

test_steps.action: Verify PDF export renders all data correctly.
test_steps.expected_result: PDF output matches screen display with proper formatting.

acceptance_criteria: Exported data matches source records exactly.
PDF rendering preserves all data and formatting.
Export function honors role-based permissions.
data_integrity_requirements: Exported data must be complete and unaltered.
Export must include all required metadata.
urs_requirements: URS-026-009: The platform shall provide governed export to CSV/PDF using vendor export features.
URS-026-011: Access to GxP semantic layers shall be read-only for end-users.

test_cases.test_name: Verify Dashboard Load Performance for 50M-Row Datasets
test_cases.objective: Ensure dashboards load within 5 seconds for datasets containing 50 million rows under normal load conditions.

test_steps.action: Access the pre-built dashboard for deviations.
test_steps.expected_result: Dashboard loads within 5 seconds.

acceptance_criteria: Dashboard loads within 5 seconds
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data displayed is accurate and consistent with the dataset

test_cases.test_name: Validate Integration with SSO and AD Groups for Role Mapping
test_cases.objective: Verify the platform integrates with SSO (SAML/OIDC) and AD groups to map user roles correctly.
prerequisites: User roles defined in the platform

test_steps.action: Log in using SSO credentials.
test_steps.expected_result: User is authenticated and role is mapped correctly based on AD group.

acceptance_criteria: User is authenticated via SSO
Role is mapped correctly based on AD group
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure role mapping is accurate and consistent with AD group membership

test_cases.test_name: Integration with SSO and AD Groups for Role Mapping
test_cases.objective: Verify the platform integrates with SSO (SAML/OIDC) and AD groups for accurate role mapping.

test_steps.action: Log in to the platform using SSO credentials.
test_steps.expected_result: User is successfully authenticated and logged in.

test_steps.action: Verify the user role matches the AD group membership.
test_steps.expected_result: User role is correctly mapped based on AD group.

acceptance_criteria: SSO login is successful
User role is correctly mapped to AD group
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure role mapping is accurate and consistent

test_cases.objective: Validate that scheduled report generation completes within 10 minutes for enterprise distributions.

test_steps.action: Schedule a report for enterprise distribution.
test_steps.expected_result: Report is successfully scheduled.

test_steps.action: Monitor the report generation process and record the time taken.
test_steps.expected_result: Report generation completes within 10 minutes.

acceptance_criteria: Report is scheduled successfully
Report generation completes within 10 minutes
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure report data is accurate and complete

test_cases.objective: Ensure that row-level security is enforced based on configured roles to restrict data access appropriately.
prerequisites: Test dataset with row-level security rules

test_steps.action: Log in as a user with a restricted role.
test_steps.expected_result: User should only see data rows permitted by their role.

test_steps.action: Attempt to access data rows outside the user's role.
test_steps.expected_result: Access to restricted data rows should be denied.

acceptance_criteria: Row-level security is enforced correctly for all configured roles.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data access is restricted as per role configurations.

test_cases.objective: Verify that scheduled report generation completes within the specified time frame for enterprise distributions.

test_steps.action: Schedule a standard report for generation.
test_steps.expected_result: Report generation should be initiated successfully.

test_steps.action: Monitor the report generation process.
test_steps.expected_result: Report generation should complete within 10 minutes.

acceptance_criteria: Scheduled report generation completes within 10 minutes for enterprise distributions.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure report data is accurate and complete.
